test_cases.title: Session Management and Authentication Tests
test_cases.name: Session Management and Authentication Tests
test_cases.description: Tests session timeout, concurrent login prevention, and authentication bypass attempts.
test_cases.type: Static test case (security testing for authentication).

steps.step_action: Open browser, navigate to login page, enter valid credentials for @role, and successfully log in (verify dashboard loads).
steps.step_expected: Login successful and dashboard loads completely.

steps.step_action: Note session start time and open Users Online page.
steps.step_expected: Users Online page displays current active sessions.

steps.step_action: Remain idle for configured session timeout period (e.g., 30 minutes).
steps.step_expected: Session remains idle for configured timeout duration.

steps.step_action: Attempt to access protected page after timeout.
steps.step_expected: Access attempt is made after timeout period.

steps.step_action: Verify automatic redirect to login page with session expired message.
steps.step_expected: User is redirected to login with session timeout notification.

steps.step_action: Open second browser window and attempt concurrent login with same credentials.
steps.step_expected: Concurrent login attempt is made with same user account.

steps.step_action: Verify system behavior for concurrent sessions (allow/deny based on configuration).
steps.step_expected: System enforces concurrent session policy correctly.

steps.step_action: Navigate to logout button in first session and successfully log out (verify session ends).
steps.step_expected: Logout successful and redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Role Escalation Prevention Tests
test_cases.name: Role Escalation Prevention Tests
test_cases.description: Tests prevention of privilege escalation through UI manipulation or API calls.
test_cases.type: Static test case (negative security testing).

steps.step_action: Open browser, navigate to login page, enter valid credentials for @role, and successfully log in (verify dashboard loads).
steps.step_expected: Login successful and dashboard loads completely.

steps.step_action: Open browser developer tools and inspect current user role claims.
steps.step_expected: Developer tools reveal current role assignments.

steps.step_action: Attempt to modify role claim in browser storage (localStorage/sessionStorage).
steps.step_expected: Browser storage modification is attempted.

steps.step_action: Try to access sysAdmin-only pages (e.g., Manage Users, Edit Groups).
steps.step_expected: Access attempts to admin pages are blocked.

steps.step_action: Attempt direct API calls to user management endpoints with modified role.
steps.step_expected: API calls with invalid roles are rejected.

steps.step_action: Try to escalate privileges through Edit User Account page for own account.
steps.step_expected: Self-privilege escalation is prevented.

steps.step_action: Verify all escalation attempts are blocked at server-side validation.
steps.step_expected: Server-side validation rejects all escalation attempts.

steps.step_action: Navigate to logout button and successfully log out (verify session ends).
steps.step_expected: Logout successful and redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Audit Trail Completeness and Tamper Protection
test_cases.name: Audit Trail Completeness and Tamper Protection
test_cases.description: Tests comprehensive audit logging for all RBAC-related actions and protection against log tampering.
test_cases.type: Requirement-based test case (audit requirements per DAFI 3.2.2.9.3).

steps.step_action: Open browser, navigate to login page, enter valid credentials for @role, and successfully log in (verify dashboard loads).
steps.step_expected: Login successful and dashboard loads completely.

steps.step_action: Navigate to User Activity Log via direct URL.
steps.step_expected: User Activity Log page loads successfully.

steps.step_action: Filter logs for recent RBAC-related actions.
steps.step_expected: Filtered logs display RBAC-related activities.

steps.step_action: Verify audit entries include: timestamp, user ID, action, result, IP address.
steps.step_expected: All required audit fields are present in log entries.

steps.step_action: Check that failed access attempts are logged with denial reasons.
steps.step_expected: Failed attempts show detailed denial information.

steps.step_action: Verify workflow signatures are logged in core_SignatureMetaData table.
steps.step_expected: Signature metadata is properly recorded in database.

steps.step_action: Attempt to modify audit log entries (should be prevented).
steps.step_expected: Audit log modification attempts are blocked.

steps.step_action: Export audit log and verify data integrity and completeness.
steps.step_expected: Exported audit log maintains data integrity.

steps.step_action: Navigate to logout button and successfully log out (verify session ends).
steps.step_expected: Logout successful and redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: DAFI 36-2910 Timeline Compliance Validation
test_cases.name: DAFI 36-2910 Timeline Compliance Validation
test_cases.description: Tests system enforcement of DAFI timelines (90-day LOD completion, 30-day appeals, etc.).
test_cases.type: Requirement-based test case (DAFI Table 3.1 timelines).

steps.step_action: Open browser, navigate to login page, enter valid credentials for @role, and successfully log in (verify dashboard loads).
steps.step_expected: Login successful and dashboard loads completely.

steps.step_action: Access LOD PM Compliance Report showing timeline adherence.
steps.step_expected: LOD PM Compliance Report loads with timeline data.

steps.step_action: Filter for cases approaching 90-day completion deadline.
steps.step_expected: Filtered results show cases near 90-day deadline.

steps.step_action: Verify system displays warning indicators for overdue cases.
steps.step_expected: Warning indicators appear for cases exceeding deadlines.

steps.step_action: Check that automated reminder emails are sent per DAFI 3.2.2.6.3.3.
steps.step_expected: Automated reminders are sent according to DAFI requirements.

steps.step_action: Access finalized case and verify 30-day appeal window calculation.
steps.step_expected: 30-day appeal window is calculated correctly.

steps.step_action: Attempt to submit appeal after 30-day deadline expires.
steps.step_expected: Late appeal submission is attempted.

steps.step_action: Verify system prevents late appeal submission with clear error message.
steps.step_expected: System blocks late appeal with appropriate error message.

steps.step_action: Navigate to logout button and successfully log out (verify session ends).
steps.step_expected: Logout successful and redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Data Masking and PII Protection Tests
test_cases.name: Data Masking and PII Protection Tests
test_cases.description: Tests proper masking of sensitive data (SSN, medical info) based on role permissions.
test_cases.type: Query-based test case (PII protection across modules).

steps.step_action: Open browser, navigate to login page, enter valid credentials for @role, and successfully log in (verify dashboard loads).
steps.step_expected: Login successful and dashboard loads completely.

steps.step_action: Search for LOD cases and open case list view.
steps.step_expected: LOD case list loads with search results.

steps.step_action: Verify SSN is masked in list view (e.g., XXX-XX-1234 format).
steps.step_expected: SSN displays in masked format protecting PII.

steps.step_action: Open case details and check medical diagnosis field masking.
steps.step_expected: Medical diagnosis is properly masked based on role.

steps.step_action: Attempt to view investigation report details without proper role.
steps.step_expected: Investigation details are hidden for unauthorized roles.

steps.step_action: Verify restricted SARC cases show minimal information.
steps.step_expected: SARC restricted cases display limited data only.

steps.step_action: Export search results and verify PII masking in exported data.
steps.step_expected: Exported data maintains PII masking consistently.

steps.step_action: Navigate to logout button and successfully log out (verify session ends).
steps.step_expected: Logout successful and redirected to login page.

suites.description: Exploratory testing for RBAC UI with accessibility tools to ensure compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards and assistive technology support.

test_cases.title: Internationalization and Accessibility RBAC Testing
test_cases.name: Internationalization and Accessibility RBAC Testing
test_cases.description: Testing for RBAC UI with accessibility tools and internationalization considerations.
test_cases.type: Manual test case (accessibility compliance).

steps.step_action: Test keyboard-only navigation through role-based menus and pages.
steps.step_expected: All menus and pages are accessible using only keyboard navigation.

steps.step_action: Use screen reader to verify access denied messages are clearly announced.
steps.step_expected: Screen reader correctly announces all access denied messages.

steps.step_action: Check color contrast for permission indicators and error messages (WCAG compliance).
steps.step_expected: All color contrasts meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

steps.step_action: Test tab order for forms with role-based field visibility.
steps.step_expected: Tab order is logical and skips hidden fields appropriately.

steps.step_action: Verify ARIA labels for role-specific UI elements.
steps.step_expected: All role-specific elements have proper ARIA labels.

steps.step_action: Test with browser zoom levels (200%, 400%) for readability.
steps.step_expected: UI remains functional and readable at all zoom levels.

steps.step_action: Check focus indicators for interactive elements.
steps.step_expected: All interactive elements have visible focus indicators.

steps.step_action: Verify that all RBAC error messages are accessible to assistive technologies.
steps.step_expected: Error messages are properly announced by assistive technologies.
